::Killfest/Greven/EndBringer::

Killfest approaches the Cybertronian Fire, looking down at all the 
fighting bots. He viewed his scanner reports in slight 
dissapointment, seeing that he was too late to beat the slag out of 
Hell Beast. Oh well, life was full of dissapointments.

Picking out a random bot, Killfest arms his missile launcher and EMP 
rifle, firing off two missiles and three EMP blasts at Vehement. Over 
his team's communication system, he told his troops not to fire on 
any Decepticons.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Greven also flies into the battlefield, seeing Sun Crusher. He aims 
both of his missile launchers, firing two missiles from each at the 
bot.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
EndBringer doesn't bother to keep his jetpack any longer than 
neccessary to get him to the battle. He arrives, throwing his jetpack 
down at Reflector as he flies down toward him, his tentacles ready to 
shock the slag out of the Brotherhood member.
